H0.text: Which North African country's flag is just the colour green. Egypt

H1.text: Which North African country's flag is just the colour green. Morocco

H2.text: Which North African country's flag is just the colour green. Algeria

H3.text: Which North African country's flag is just the colour green. LBY

A4.text: Libya had an all-green flag from 1977 to 2011, during which it was the only national flag in the world to have one colour and no design.
